description: This file defines a React functional component for a 'Saved Jobs' page, which fetches and displays jobs that the user has saved. It manages state for loading, errors, and saved jobs, and updates the view when saved jobs change or when jobs are fetched. It also handles displaying unavailable jobs and allows removing them from saved list.

methods.name: SavedJobsPage()
methods.description: Main React component rendering the saved jobs page, handling data fetching, state management, and rendering of job cards and notifications.
